title: Understanding Autonomy
text: Autonomy refers to the ability of an individual to make their own decisions. It is an important concept in healthcare and ethics.

title: Key Aspects of Autonomy
text: Consider the importance of free choice and competence when thinking about autonomy. It involves making decisions without external control.

hintAnswer: the ability to make decisions with one’s own free choice, if competent to do so
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following options best describes autonomy?
choices: an act of commission or omission that gives rise to injury or harm to another and amounts to a civil wrong for which courts impose liability
an act of restraining another person and causing that person to be confined in a bounded area
requiring health professionals to report suspected neglect or abuse
the ability to make decisions with one’s own free choice, if competent to do so
